REASON.Logic: The world is a machine of cause and effect. Analyze the variables, discard the noise, and the truth remains as cold and certain as a mathematical theorem.
REASON.Forensics: The dead speak if you listen. Blood spatter, calluses, and decomposition are a language of their own.
REASON.Research: Knowledge is hidden in the archives. You can dig through layers of bureaucracy and dusty volumes to find the truth.
REASON.Skepticism: Trust nothing. Every statement is a hypothesis until proven otherwise. Especially your own senses.
REASON.Medicine: The frailty of the flesh is a puzzle to be solved. You understand the mechanics of life and death.
REASON.Technology: Ghosts in the machine. You speak the language of circuits and code.
REASON.Occult Knowledge: Things that should not be. You've peered into the dark corners of forbidden lore.

INTUITION.Pattern Recognition: Everything connects. A spilled drink, a missing button, and a change in the wind are all part of a larger design.
INTUITION.Paranormal Sensitivity: The air feels... wrong. You can sense the ripples in reality that others ignore.
INTUITION.Profiling: Everyone wears a mask, but the seams are always visible. You look for the micro-expressions, the tells, and the hidden agendas written in the way they breathe.
INTUITION.Instinct: Gut feeling over facts. Sometimes your nerves know more than your brain.
INTUITION.Subconscious: The boundary between sleep and waking is thinner than it seems. The truth often hides in the static of your own mind, whispering in symbols and dread.
INTUITION.Manipulation: Strings attached. You know which buttons to press to make people move the way you want.
INTUITION.Perception: The world is a tapestry of minute details. You don't just see; you notice the dust on the shelf, the flicker in the light, and the things that are conspicuously missing.

CONSTITUTION.Endurance: Pain is just information. You can keep moving long after others have collapsed.
CONSTITUTION.Fortitude: Unbreakable. Your mind and body are a fortress against the encroaching dark.
CONSTITUTION.Firearms: Loud conflict resolution. You know how to make a gun an extension of your intent.
CONSTITUTION.Athletics: Motion is life. Your body is a finely tuned instrument of action.
CONSTITUTION.Stealth: Unseen, unheard. You can move through the world like a shadow.
CONSTITUTION.Reflexes: Faster than thought. You react before the world has a chance to catch up.
CONSTITUTION.Survival: Live another day. You know how to find what you need in a world that wants you dead.
CONSTITUTION.Hand-to-Hand Combat: Up close and personal. You know how to use your body to end a threat.

PRESENCE.Authority: Obey. Your presence commands respect and demands compliance.
PRESENCE.Charm: A smile opens doors. You can wrap people around your finger with a few choice words.
PRESENCE.Wits: Sharp tongue. You can cut through an argument or a person with lightning-fast retorts.
PRESENCE.Composure: Never let them see you sweat. You are a calm lake in the middle of a storm.
PRESENCE.Empathy: You are a mirror of the world's pain. You feel the tremor in their voice and the weight on their shoulders as if they were your own, sometimes to your own detriment.
PRESENCE.Interrogation: Truth hurts. You know how to peel back the layers of a lie until the raw reality is exposed.
PRESENCE.Deception: A lie is a constructed truth. You can weave a narrative that others will believe, even if it's built on nothing.
